data.message:
Dear person reading this,
I hope your day has been going well, if not, I hope it gets better  You are an amazing person who will inspire others to do great things so keep up the hard work. I know you may feel unimportant or insecure at the moment but know that you are a beautiful human being inside and out and you are important !
Sometimes we just need such a message !
Bye

replies.message: Hey Nikola. Thank you so much for the kind words! We appreciate your great feedback and will be sure to share this with the rest of our team. -Sarah

Thank you for your kind words, just that little paragraph could mean the world to someone who feels there is nothing out there, and then after reading what you wrote believe that there is still some kind loving humans still in this world. Never hesitate to be the true you.
No problem. i hope my message helped you and made  your day better. I think all that we need is love. Stay positive
Jesus gave us his life, now that's the greatest love ever.
Thank you so much, this was a comfirmation from God, bless you and your family in Jesus name Amen bless your heart!!!!!!!
